top_comments.comment: I wish the Avengers game by Square Enix had been like this Guardians of the Galaxy game! The games as a service ruined the Avenger game, what a huge loss. Also Deus Ex was stopped because of that live service game so that is another strike. Please support these single player games because we need more of them .
Please do a Tech Analysis on PC
This game is so well optimized for PC. I get 80 to 90 fps on 4k maxed out settings

comments_since_last_sample.body: I honestly can't tell the quality differences between the two modes until they're specifically pointed out to me, but I definitely notice how much smoother performance mode runs.
90-110fps 4k ultra with DLSS Performance mode. Looks and runs amazing on the RTX 3080, 9600k
This game is so well optimized for PC. I get 80 to 90 fps on 4k maxed out settings
